executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
This is a BACKEND test run against the Fastify server on port 3001. All 10 backend test cases should be executed. The server is running and healthy. Key context:

- GET /health should return 200 with status 'ok', tick count, and agent count
- POST /v1/agents/enter requires ownerId in the body. For testing, use any string wallet address like '0xTEST1234'. The server will attempt on-chain verification via ERC-8004 which may fail for fake addresses - test both success and error paths.
- GET /v1/world/state returns current world snapshot with agents and tick
- GET /v1/agents/:id returns agent details - there are 9 agents loaded in the world currently
- POST /v1/grid/plot and POST /v1/grid/terminal create world objects
- GET /v1/grid/state returns all world objects
- POST /v1/reputation/feedback and GET /v1/reputation/:agentId handle reputation

The server uses JWT auth for some endpoints. The /v1/agents/enter endpoint returns a token that should be used as Bearer token for authenticated endpoints.
